abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column examines how boom in online ordination of wedding officiants, particularly from Universal Life Church, reflects changes in way Americans view religion and the importance of marriage; notes that upsurge in same-sex marriages and interfaith marriages is only partly responsible for boom.
lead_paragraph: A recent boom in online ordination of wedding officiants speaks to deep changes in the American views of both marriage and religion.

headline.main: Couples Personalizing Role of Religion in Wedding Ceremonies
headline.print_headline: Couples Enlist Online-Ordained Officiants, Redefining Nuptials

snippet: A recent boom in online ordination of wedding officiants speaks to deep changes in the American views of both marriage and religion.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
